wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.name: type
wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.description: Required. Type of the ticket summary message component. Available types: you-can, you-cannot, you-must, swift

wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.name: classes
wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.description: Classes to add to the ticket summary message container

wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.name: contentBeforeText
wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.description: The text that displays before the list in the ticket summary message component. You can use any string with this option. If you set contentBeforeHTML, this option is ignored.

wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.name: contentBeforeHTML
wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.description: The HTML to use before the list within the ticket summary message component. You can use any string with this option. If you set contentBeforeHTML, contentBeforeText is ignored.

wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.name: listItemsHTML
wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.description: Required. Array of HTML strings used as list items. Each item in the array will be wrapped in li tags.

wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.name: contentAfterText
wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.description: The text that displays after the list in the ticket summary message component. You can use any string with this option. If you set contentAfterHTML, this option is ignored.

wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.name: contentAfterHTML
wmndsTicketSummaryMsgProps.description: The HTML to use after the list within the ticket summary message component. You can use any string with this option. If you set contentAfterHTML, contentAfterText is ignored.
